title: Khalil Mack to Chargers, Impact to AFC West, Steelers QB search,  Mitch Trubisky and Marcus Mariota futures, and Free Agency steals
itunes:title: Khalil Mack to Chargers, Impact to AFC West, Steelers QB search,  Mitch Trubisky and Marcus Mariota futures, and Free Agency steals
description:
In the latest edition of The Good Morning Football Podcast, Hosts Kay Adams, Mike Garafolo and Super Bowl Champions LeSean McCoy and Shaun O'Hara discuss a trade sending Khalil Mack to the Chargers and how it would affect the AFC West. Are the Chiefs still the favorites in the division with Mahomes? While it may be a good move for the Bears, Kay wishes the franchise had gotten more in return. The Steelers are in the QB market and the crew wonders if Kenny Pickett could be their target in the Draft. Mitch Trubisky and Marcus Mariota are two QBs that will get significant interest in free agency, but who will be the biggest overall steals in Free Agency.

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
